str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To name, impose a name on; pass: be named. From epi and onomazo; to name further, i.e. Denominate.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To rest upon, rely on, trust in. Middle voice from epi and anapano; to settle on; literally or figuratively.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To boast; I glory (exult) proudly. From some base akin to that of aucheo and euchomai; to vaunt.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
